docs.text: Availability List The availability list is a rolling forecast of the amount of flowers the collective has available for This Week , Next Week and Futere . The forecast amounts shown represtents the aggergrate amount across all growers in the collective.

docs.text:
Orders The Order lifecycle is intended to facilitate communication between the collectives and its members form early planning to fulfillment. graph TB start([Start]) -- Create Order --> draft(Draft
Order) -- Submit Order --> req(Requested
Order) -- MRFC Acknowledge --> pending(Pending
Order) -- MRFC Mark As Settled --> settled(Settled
Order) -- MRFC Mark As Fulfield --> fulfield(Fulfield
Order) -- MRFC Mark As Invoiced or Paid --> archived(Archived
Order) draft -- Cancel Order --> stop1([End]) req -- Edit Order --> req pending -- Edit Order --> pending pending -- MFRC Edit Order --> pending pending -- Cancel Order --> stop2([End]) settled -- View --> settled fulfield -- View --> fulfield archived -- View via Order History --> archived
docs.title: Orders
